meta.label: Regression Spline
meta.description: Split the variable into [B-spline basis](https://patsy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/spline-regression.html), which parametrizes a piecewise polynomial spline where pieces meet at each knot, the number of columns added is equal to number of knots plus the degree of the polynomial

params.name: column
params.label: Column
params.description: The column on which the spline is fitted

params.name: degree
params.label: Degree
params.description: The degree of the spline, should be between 0 and 3

params.name: min_value
params.label: Minimum Value
params.description: The minimum possible value of the column

params.name: max_value
params.label: Maximum Value
params.description: The maximum possible value of the column
